application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of condition 40 (noise, fumes,odour) submitted pursuant of planning permission 00616/F/P23 dated 17/04/2020 for Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) for a variation of Condition 2 (approved drawings); Condition 57 (Dwellings number) and 58 (Commercial Floorspace) of planning permission 00616/F/P21 to substitute the approved drawings to allow a decrease in the retail A1-A5 floor area from 11,199 sqm to 8,897 sqm (Gross External Area), introduction of 1,214 sqm (Gross External Area) B1(a) office floor space to replace retail mezzanine in units 3, 4 and 5 (Block E), 60 additional homes (11 homes through conversion of retail mezzanines in units 10 and 11 in Blocks B and C; 49 homes within additional storeys above Blocks A, B [except Tower] and C) to increase total number of residential homes to 588, and alterations to the fenestration, elevational detailing, massing, amenity space and cycle parking provision for development comprising: Demolition of commercial and residential properties, site clearance and redevelopment comprising the construction of a mixed-use development comprising private and affordable residential units, a multiscreen cinema, commercial floorspace, infrastructure including parking spaces, cycle parking spaces, service areas, public realm incorporating pedestrian/cycle circulation areas with associated hard and soft landscaping and private amenity spaces.
